title: Ann Arbor Meetup This Thursday
summary:
Key ideas
- The author (Scott) is hosting a meet-up event in Ann Arbor as part of the Meetups Everywhere tour.
- The event will be held at Burns Park near the Warming Hut.
- Anyone is welcome to attend the event, regardless of whether they are a typical reader of Scott's blog, feel awkward about attending or worried people won't like them.

Key learnings
- Meet-up events provide a platform for readers and followers to connect in person with the author or content creator they follow.
- Such events can be held anywhere and are a great way to meet new people and make connections.

Key questions
- What can attendees expect from the event?
- How will attendees interact and connect with each other?
- What kind of turnout does Scott expect and how will he ensure that all attendees feel welcomed and included?
